author: serge
msg: Made the error message when there are no DNS entries more descriptive (used to be 'no route to host', re: bug 8160), moved the setting of the servername property to the run method so it only happens once during initiatization, and cleaned up the exception handling as it was a bit fugly and I think could have explained why certain MessagingExceptions, while having an IOException as the next exception, would still have an immediate failure.

author: danny
msg: added a line about address harvesting in the spam FAQ

author: serge
msg: Have it ignore IO/Socket exceptions when the remote manager handling commands (reported by Larry Harnel as bug 6602 for when the socket times out).
